languages.text: {n}Голова друкари разлетается на ошметки, некоторые прилипают к морде змея. Его внимание — как и внимание каждого в этом месте — теперь принадлежит только вам.{/n}
{n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голова друкари разлетается на ошметки, некоторые прилипают к морде змея. Его внимание — как и внимание каждого в этом месте — теперь принадлежит только вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, some of the scraps sticking to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}
{n}The Drukhari's head shatters, some of the scraps sticking to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}
{n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}
{n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}
{n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个黑暗灵族的头被打碎了，一部分残片沾在了那只蛇人脸上。现在，他所有的注意力都集中在了你身上，房间里所有其他人也都在盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个黑暗灵族的头被打碎了，一部分残片沾在了那只蛇人脸上。现在，他所有的注意力都集中在了你身上，房间里所有其他人也都在盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cabeza de la Drukhari estalla y algunos de los fragmentos se pegan a la cara del xenos serpentino. Has llamado plenamente su atención y la del resto de la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cabeza de la Drukhari estalla y algunos de los fragmentos se pegan a la cara del xenos serpentino. Has llamado plenamente su atención y la del resto de la sala.{/n}

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの頭が粉々に砕かれ、破片の一部が蛇のような異種族の顔に飛び散った。これで、この人物…そして部屋中のすべての者の注意を引くことができた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの頭が粉々に砕かれ、破片の一部が蛇のような異種族の顔に飛び散った。これで、この人物…そして部屋中のすべての者の注意を引くことができた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Kopf der Drukhari zerspringt, und einige der Splitter bleiben im schlangenartigen Gesicht des Xenos stecken. Du hast nun seine ungeteilte Aufmerksamkeit — und die aller anderen im Raum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kopf der Drukhari zerspringt, und einige der Splitter bleiben im schlangenartigen Gesicht des Xenos stecken. Du hast nun seine ungeteilte Aufmerksamkeit — und die aller anderen im Raum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tête de la Drukhari explose et des bouts de cervelle viennent se coller sur le visage du xénos serpentin. Vous avez réussi à attirer son attention... ainsi que celle de toutes les autres personnes présentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tête de la Drukhari explose et des bouts de cervelle viennent se coller sur le visage du xénos serpentin. Vous avez réussi à attirer son attention... ainsi que celle de toutes les autres personnes présentes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drukhari'nin başının infilak etmesiyle birtakım parçalar, yılanımsı zenonun yüzüne sıçrıyor. Odadaki diğer herkes gibi o da tüm dikkatini sana veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's head shatters, and some of the scraps stick to the snake-like xenos's face. You now have his undivided attention — and that of everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari'nin infilak eden başından bazı parçalar yılanımsı zenonun yüzüne sıçrıyor. Artık odadaki diğer herkes gibi o da tüm dikkatini sana vermiş vaziyette.{/n}
